title: LEGO Harry Potter: Building the Magical World
description: Includes exclusive LEGO(r) Harry Potter TM minifigure! The magic of Harry Potter TM and the fun of the LEGO(r) world, now in one incredible book! Since it was first introduced in 2001, LEGO(r) Harry Potter TM has been one of the LEGO Group's most popular themes. This incredible guide gives readers an up close look at the bricks, constructions, and minifigures of the LEGO(r) Harry Potter TM universe - from Hogwarts Castle to Hagrid's hut. You won't want to miss out on the exclusive interviews with the LEGO(r) Harry Potter TM team, and special sections allowing you to see, firsthand, how the bricks and figures come to be the toys we love today! The book will feature a timeline that shows the evolution of the LEGO(r) Harry Potter TM construction sets, video games, and board game.LEGO, the LEGO logo, the Brick configuration and the Minifigure are trademarks of the LEGO Group. author: Elizabeth Dowsett
